Title: Calling the Stormriders
Description:
I know the Unbound can repair and unblock the Coreway expediently--but I also know the nerubians. If they see an opportunity for an ambush, they will take it.

With our backs turned and our focus on the Coreway, we are prime targets.

I need to rally my Stormriders and form a perimeter around Dornogal in case of an attack from within or from without.

Meet me outside of the Stormperch. I will call upon my troops there.
ObjectivesText:
Meet Baelgrim outside the Stormperch, then speak with him to follow him into The Rookery.

This challenge may be completed solo or with up to 3 party members.
CompletionText: Baelgrim is right. We need to defend the Unbound while they work on the Coreway.
RewardText:
The entire Rookery?

I see.

At least the source is destroyed. I lament the loss of so many Stormriders but...

If the corruption had spread to Dornogal...

Objectives.Text: Speak to Baelgrim to enter the Rookery
